Class TDBStandard

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--TDB
        |
        +--TDBStandard
public class TDBStandard
extends TDB

The TDBStandard extends TDB is the main actor of the game DB module. It contains abstract needed methods that the duaghter class must at list implement.

Constructor Summary

          The constructor create a PerformreLoader which instanciate a new Performer.

Constructor Detail

TDBStandard

public TDBStandard(java.lang.String login,
                   java.lang.String pass)
The constructor create a PerformreLoader which instanciate a new Performer. To do so the constructor need a database adress and a couple (login, pass)

Method Detail

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
The method getName returns a string that contains the type of the TDB. In this class it always returns "TDBStandard"

initTables

public void initTables()
This method checks if the tables needed by the application exists on the database. if the tables don't exist, initTables create it.
